name: Andromeda's Challenge
description:
There is an impenetrable region by its strong magnetic field in the Andromeda Galaxy, and can only be traversed by dodging a few aliens parallelepipeds. Your challenge is to cross the 100 sectors collecting as many stars as possible.

- Real 3D game.
- No Ads.
- Retina HD images.
- 100 Levels.
- Every 4 hours you get a new life, up to 10.
